Sign Language Interpreter: Develop an app that allows users to sign using their smartphone camera, which can then be translated into text or speech. This would allow people who are deaf or hard of hearing to communicate effectively in any situation.

Infrared Light Communication: Create a device that uses infrared light to transmit messages through walls and other barriers. This could be particularly useful for emergency situations where communication is difficult or impossible.

Smart Earplugs: Design earplugs that use machine learning algorithms to translate spoken language into text or speech. These earplugs could be used by people who are deaf or hard of hearing, as well as those who want to improve their listening skills.

Voice-to-Text Translator: Create a device that translates spoken language into text in real-time. This could be particularly useful for people who are traveling to foreign countries or communicating with people who speak different languages.

Audio-based Augmentative and Alternative Communication (AAC): Develop a system that uses audio signals to convey information to people who are unable to speak. This could include devices that emit specific sounds or vibrations to indicate certain actions or emotions.
